<h3 id="X38149">X(38149) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(7), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^6-6*(b+c)*a^5+(b+3*c)*(3*b+c)*a^4-8*b*c*(b+c)*a^3-3*(b^2-c^2)^2*a^2+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38149) = X(4)+2*X(2550) = 2*X(4)+X(35514) = 4*X(5)-X(390) = X(7)+2*X(355) = X(8)+2*X(5805) = 2*X(9)-5*X(5818) = 4*X(10)-X(5759) = 2*X(119)+X(20119) = 4*X(142)-X(944) = X(145)-4*X(20330) = 4*X(2550)-X(35514) = 3*X(5587)-2*X(38158) = 3*X(5817)-4*X(38158) = X(11372)-4*X(19925) = 3*X(21151)-4*X(38123) = 2*X(38036)-3*X(38073) = 3*X(38052)-2*X(38123) = 3*X(38073)-4*X(38151) = 3*X(38092)-2*X(38121) = 3*X(38092)-4*X(38170)</b>
<p>X(38149) lies on these lines: {2,38031}, {4,9}, {5,390}, {7,355}, {8,5805}, {30,38092}, {119,20119}, {142,944}, {145,20330}, {388,37712}, {443,5731}, {497,7988}, {515,21151}, {519,38036}, {527,38074}, {528,3545}, {631,3826}, {673,7402}, {952,1056}, {954,6843}, {962,18482}, {971,3753}, {1001,3090}, {1058,5703}, {1389,6601}, {1478,30286}, {1503,38185}, {2478,38132}, {2829,38202}, {2951,31673}, {3059,7686}, {3091,5687}, {3158,3817}, {3421,6839}, {3434,5748}, {3529,11495}, {3560,7676}, {3576,38204}, {4312,4848}, {5055,38043}, {5082,5730}, {5225,7989}, {5263,36682}, {5542,5881}, {5603,5853}, {5686,5762}, {5690,31671}, {5714,12560}, {5735,24393}, {5763,5780}, {5779,18357}, {5787,11024}, {5795,5833}, {5842,38203}, {5843,6917}, {5844,38137}, {5845,38144}, {5846,38143}, {5850,38155}, {5851,38156}, {5852,38157}, {5854,38152}, {5855,38153}, {5880,36996}, {6173,34627}, {6253,19855}, {6827,38113}, {6855,11499}, {6858,18524}, {6865,11231}, {6867,8543}, {6885,30312}, {6896,7704}, {6911,7677}, {6916,28160}, {6935,34474}, {6939,37820}, {7967,38053}, {8226,17784}, {8227,30331}, {8732,37281}, {9780,31658}, {9812,10157}, {9956,18230}, {10165,17582}, {10172,17559}, {10246,38171}, {11729,12730}, {12630,24680}, {12669,34339}, {18480,36991}, {18525,31657}, {19875,38130}, {20533,36662}, {24474,34784}, {28204,38030}, {28224,38111}, {28236,38054}, {30340,37705}</p>
<p>
X(38149) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3576, 38204), (5603, 38150), (5657, 38200), (5686, 5790), (5731, 38122), (5817, 5587), (7967, 38053), (8236, 5886), (10246, 38171), (11038, 38107), (21151, 38052), (21168, 38057), (38030, 38172), (38036, 38151), (38121, 38170)<br>
X(38149) = anticomplement of X(38031)<br>
X(38149) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 2550, 35514), (11038, 30275, 38056), (38036, 38151, 38073), (38121, 38170, 38092)<br>
</p>
